channel.title: Wwise Lancher Fails to download
channel.description:
Hi all, new modder here. I cant seem to download wwise from https://www.audiokinetic.com/download/ as the secure connection seems to fail. This to me indicates its the ssl at their end not mine but regardless is anyone else having this issue and is it a nessessary step? I am following along the guide to get started.
Cheers
